title: What we do
content:
King's Paediatric Liver Centre is a national hub providing a highly specialised service to children with liver problems. We are the largest service of its type in the world.
 
We assess and treat children with:

neonatal (newborn) liver diseases,
chronic (long-standing) liver disease,
acute liver failure. 
We also offer surgery for liver tumours and pancreas conditions, and carry out liver and small bowel transplantations.

title: Preparing for your appointment
content: Please do not arrive more than 30 minutes before your appointment. Arriving early will not enable you to be seen before your appointment time.
